notes.text:
This update for zabbix fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-22119: Fixed a stored XSS in graph items select form (boo#1219775).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The cause of vulnerability is improper validation of form input field "Name" on Graph page in Items section.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
